table.caption: Guild Villains
rows: A villain is attempting to disgrace or discredit a powerful person.
A villain is striving for power within their guild.
A villain has claimed power in their guild and needs to be supplanted.
The villain is sending agents to infiltrate one or more guilds.
The villain's agents are luring members away from another guild.
The villain's agents are sabotaging the operations of another guild.
